posts.post_content:
I need the following 4 sweet cap 150/649 overprints to finish the subset:

- Whitey Alperman
- Roger Bresnahan portrait
- JJ Clarke
- Tom Jones

Ideal card would be raw GD to VG, but willing to look at whatever you got.  Email [url]vettejayk@aol.com[/url]

Hey man, I have a JJ Clarke with a Sweet Cap 150/649 back graded SGC 50.  Would be happy to sell it at my cost ($69.49), plus three bucks for shipping.  Please let me know if interested.  Can send scans...

Marty

I have all 4.  Alperman and Jones in PSA 2.  Clarke is raw, vg.  Breshnahan is raw, Good.  Creased.

$225 delivered for the stack of 4.  Or if you buy the Clark above I’d sell you the other 3 for $180
